title: Bug 16822 - Search results not removed after moving file
OB: After moving X.java to 'P/src2', the search result remains in the search view. When attempting to double-click on the search result, a 'Search Error' dialog appears with the message: 'An error occurred while creating a Java element. Reason: X.java does not exist.'
EB: Search results should be automatically removed when a file (e.g., X.java) is moved to a different location (e.g., 'P/src2').
SR:
1. Open the search view.
2. Move a Java file (e.g., X.java) to a different directory (e.g., 'P/src2').
3. Observe that the search result for the moved file is not removed from the search view.
